paper.title: Analyzing program solutions of coordination problems by cp-nets

author.org: Zentrallaboratorium für Fernschreib- und Signaltechnik Siemens AG

paper.abstract: Remembering the history of DIJKSTRAu0027s problem and of its various solutions it seems that this problem is vexatious enough to test how useful a formal model can be in describing and building up structures of concurrently running processes. Insofar, with the results mentioned above first steps have been made to solve and to analyze a larger class of coordination problems.
